statements: DELETE FROM film_inventory WHERE film_id = 1 AND dvd_id = 101;
DELETE FROM film_inventory WHERE dvd_id = 202 AND film_id = 2;
DELETE FROM film_inventory WHERE film_id = 5 AND dvd_id = 10;
DELETE FROM dvds WHERE film_id NOT IN (SELECT film_id FROM films WHERE film_director = 'Christopher Nolan');
DELETE FROM DVD WHERE quantity > 10 AND film_id = 3;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND dvd_id IN (SELECT dvd_id FROM dvd WHERE film_id = 100);
